name: Fantasy Life Simulator
description:
This game is in development. I thought that posting it here and sharing links will inspire me to work further on the game. It is quite bare bones at the moment. I welcome all criticism. I've been staring at it for so long that its hard to see which parts aren't working. 

There isn't really any "end game" as of yet. 

Things I want to add:

- There are currently the beginnings of NPC questlines for 2/3 NPCs. I want to fully flesh these out and add more

- I currently have 1 full scale "quest" that you can take. I want to make many many more.

- Many many many many more random events

- Combat system is hella basic, but I don't really want it to be a combat focused game. If you have any ideas, feel free to share.

- I am working on a trades system. So becoming an innkeeper, herbalist, court wizard, blacksmith, etc.

- Currently the companions don't do much. Eventually they will augment your combat stats, and let you do unique things.

I have set up an e-mail for feedback: stone.app.systems@gmail.com

Please feel free to send any and all feedback.
